name: Blackout - Early Access
description:
Embark on a heart-pounding journey in Blackout, a riveting single-player endless zombies experience. Armed with a diverse arsenal of weapons, unique abilities, and a myriad of bullet types, players face relentless hordes of zombies. From the familiar walkers, to cunning, elusive enemy types with devious tactics, survival demands strategic thinking. Dive into an in-depth DnD-style progression system, featuring the innovative Perktronix and more, as you navigate through an ever-increasing wave of undead threats.

Face the Horde

The onslaught intensifies as you progress in Blackout. Brace yourself for dynamic challenges with new zombie types emerging every few rounds. Weaker foes are replaced, keeping you on your toes. Beware the occasional appearance of ability-immune boss zombies – formidable adversaries that pose a game-ending threat. Focus your skills and weaponry to conquer these powerful foes, ensuring your survival against the relentless tide of the undead.

Upgrades, Upgrades, Upgrades!

Immerse yourself in a 1-20 individual stat increase player upgrade system, drawing inspiration from DnD. Upgrade your stats strategically through zombies-style machines, empowering your character to confront the unyielding horde with newfound strength and resilience, the Arsenal Ascender, Fortune Teller, Perktronix machines, and more await your exploration.

Self-Defense

Equip yourself with an array of upgradable weapons, harness 15+ unique abilities, deploy grenades, and unlock special bullet types in Blackout. Mastery of these tools is the key to survival – seamlessly combine them to pave your way through the relentless waves of enemies. Each tool at your disposal offers a distinct advantage, and only those who learn to wield them in harmony will achieve the highest level of success. Face the apocalypse head-on and emerge victorious with the skillful use of your formidable arsenal.

World Progression

Journey through Blackout's dark landscapes, where the very essence of progression lies in the completion of harrowing rituals. Engage in intense battles to fill your chalice with the ritual blood of fallen enemies during these dark ceremonies. This precious resource becomes the key to unlocking gates leading to new areas of the map.
